summary: This mod adds 'Dinok', a Nordic Dragon Priest to the Palace of Kings in Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Dinok Dragon Priest Follower

[img]https://s26.postimg.org/4lrjzby4p/20180223161417_1.jpg[/img]﻿[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This mod adds 'Dinok', a Nordic Dragon Priest to the Palace of Kings in Windhelm. He comes equipped with his own enchanted versions of Miraak's robe, cultists boots & gloves and a magicka-absorbing Dragon Priest dagger. He knows two shouts as well; Firebreath and Unrelenting Force (he is a Nord Dragon Priest after all), he is set to scale with the player so he will be whatever level you currently are when you hire him, unless you are using Amazing Follower Tweaks where then he will level with you. [/size][/color][/font]


[i][color=#00ffff][size=5]Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested![/size][/color][/i]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Uniquely Enchanted Weapon & Armor[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]His own Dragon Priest Mask[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Can use shouts (Firebreath & Unrelenting Force)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed) [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Completely standalone (only official DLC-required)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Unique Spells (Conjure Spectral Dragon & Dragon Storm shout)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Comes with two new spellbooks for you[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/ ]Kalilies [/url]﻿and Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69353/?]NikiSlips[/url]﻿ for Dragon Eyes[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
